text: Which of the following statement is/are true? (a) In a lattice, if there exists a unique complement for every element, then that lattice is always complemented but it may not be distributive. (b) Every distributed lattice is complemented lattice. (¢) In a distributive lattice L, a given element ‘@’ can have at most one complement. (d) In any distributive lattice L, there doesn’t exist Diamond like structure as sub-lattice of L.
